items.title: Add --site flag to search (allow-domain + query augmentation)
items.notes: Spec: docs/spec.md:217. Done: --site query augmentation + allow-domain filtering with normalized domain inputs.

items.title: Add --accept override for fetch/extract HTTP headers
items.notes: Spec: docs/spec.md:247. Added --accept flag for fetch/extract, documented extract flag, and covered header override in CLI contract tests.

items.title: Implement robots policy (warn/respect/ignore) for network ops
items.notes: Spec: docs/spec.md:146. Default robots stance respects strict policy with CLI contract coverage for warn/respect/strict blocking.

items.title: Expose docs extractor in providers output
items.notes: Spec: docs/spec.md:192. Added docs extractor to providers output with contract coverage and docs updates.
